author: bencomic

right.text: ...jesus, i don't have any music with lyrics that are in english. they're all japanese except for one which is in LATIN

left.text: also: i hate it when i'm listening to music and humming along loudly and my mom passes by my room or comes in. especially if it's japanese (it's always japanese)

right.text: man, one time mom walked in while i was watching that anime whose intro i linked, and for some reason i was unable to alt-tab so i just stood up awkwardly with it flashing across my screen

left.text: it's especially horrible when it's this song http://youtube.com/ watch?v=rdERUrLvIW4

right.text: well, mine, anyway.  they see me as a very straight-forward, no-nonsense person who has fun by solving math problems and i don't feel like correcting that vision

left.text: the anime's great, but parents are quick to judge and make stupid assumptions so such a situation is still mortifying for me

title: a mother's nightmare vision for her son
